title: Concussed -
description: Includes 20+ new and original SUPERHEROESZon, the astrophysicist genius finally figures out his Cosmic Theory of Everything. Unfortunately, as soon as he has his genius insight, he suffers a life altering concussion, a concussion type so rare that it's the first of its kind. It prevents him from doing even simple maths. Zon wants to be normal again so badly, but the outcome of his injury won't allow it. The universe creates scenarios for a reason. The Universe's existence depends on his powers.
author: HyperStructureComics
